languages.text: The character's AGI is increased in the next combat. This is a one-time bonus that disappears after the combat ends.

languages.text: Increases the character's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} by +10 in the next combat. This is a one-time bonus that disappears after the combat ends.
